data.message: Please bring back the thankful icon in the "LIKE" area...I miss it~

replies.message: Hi Charlene. We're glad you enjoyed the flower reaction! We're continuing to test different ways to bring you the most relevant experiences for the moments you care about. -William
Me Ap Se Dosti Krna Chahta Ho Kamran Khan
เขาเมียแล้วจริงๆขอโทษ
Facebook Yeah, the thankful icon is relevant ALL the time...not just Mother's Day. Please bring it back - everyone enjoys it. It's a winner. How much more testing do you need... :-)

Facebook Also, wouldn't it be so AWESOME to be able to put a gif or vid on our cover photo area: Here's one I'd choose - check it out!  It would be great if we could use gifs for our cover 'photo' area...or short vids like this one: This would be such an AWESOME Facebook cover... 
 https://www.facebook.com/nativeamericancherokee123/videos/1844938392390532/?hc_ref=NEWSFEED
'Please say something about this video with one word ♥'
